description:
In this episode I show you the must have dungeon master tool that you didn't even know you needed. 

Join "The Fellowship" & Support Black Magic Craft on Patreon: http://patreon.com/blackmagiccraft

Get your own DM prep cart: http://www.ikea.com/us/en/catalog/products/90333976/

Join Black Magic Craft on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Black-Magic-Craft-677344725740094/?ref=bookmarks

title: Essential Equipment: Game Prep Cart For Dungeon Masters (Black Magic Craft Episode 020)
